name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made of iron.
looks: The iron sword has a straight, double-edged blade with a hilt made of leather wrapped around a metal core. The pommel features a simple design.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when equipped.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of steel
looks: The steel sword has a long blade with a single sharp edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

name: Sword of the Flame
description: A mighty sword imbued with the power of fire.
looks: The Sword of the Flame has a long and slender blade, with fiery red runes etched along its length. The hilt is made of blackened steel, adorned with intricate designs of flames.

special_effects.ignite: Has a chance to set targets on fire.

name: Golden Sword
description: A magnificent sword made of pure gold, shimmering with an otherworldly aura.
looks: The Golden Sword is a stunning weapon with a long, slender blade. The hilt is adorned with intricate designs and embedded with precious gems.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

special_effects.aura_damage: Deals additional damage based on the character's Luck stat.

name: Dragon Slayer Sword
description: A legendary sword forged to slay dragons.
looks: The Dragon Slayer Sword has a long, curved blade with a sharp point. The hilt is made of dragon scale and has intricate carvings of dragons along its length. The pommel is shaped like a dragon's head with ruby eyes.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill while wielded.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of sturdy gauntlets made of steel
looks: The gauntlets are made of smooth steel with a silver tint. They have a articulated design to allow for flexibility and movement.

name: Iron Sword
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is made of leather and wrapped in a spiral pattern.

name: Blessed Sword
description: A holy sword imbued with divine power.
looks: The Blessed Sword has a shining silver blade with intricate engravings and a golden hilt. It emits a soft glow, radiating with holy energy.

special_weapon_skills.sword_mastery: Improved sword handling and increased damage with swords.

special_effects.holy_smite: Has a chance to deal additional holy damage on hit.

name: Silver Dagger
description: A sleek dagger made from polished silver.
looks: The Silver Dagger has a slim and sharp blade, with a hilt made from polished silver. It is lightweight and easy to handle.

special_weapon_skills.dagger: Grants a bonus to Dagger skill when equipped.

name: Elven Bow
description: A beautifully crafted bow made by skilled elven craftsmen.
looks: The Elven Bow is made from rare darkwood, with intricate carvings along the limbs. It has a graceful curve and a polished finish, reflecting the light as if it were alive.

special_weapon_skills.archery: Increases damage and accuracy with bows.
